short_summary: The Health, Safety and Environment (HSE) Branch of the National Research Council Canada (NRC) has recently migrated training administration to LMS SuccessFactors and is looking for support.
description: The Health, Safety and Environment (HSE) Branch of the National Research Council Canada (NRC) has recently migrated training administration to LMS SuccessFactors and is looking for support to issue content files compliant with SCORM 1.2 and Canadian Accessibility Standards.
